name: Once Upon a Stormy Night
description:
Created for GDKO 2023 - Round 2.

Best played with headphones.

Controls – WASD or Arrow keys to move and [SPACE] to interact with objects.

Credits

Music

  • “Polybius” z3r0 (youtube.com/@z3r0CopyrightFreeMusic)
  • “Anxiety” Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • “Painful Memories” (gamedevmarket.net/asset/horror-music-atmospheres)
  • “Deep Dark” (gamedevmarket.net/asset/horror-music-atmospheres)

Sound Effects

  • Sound effects obtained from zapsplat.com
  • Additional sound effects obtained from gamemasteraudio.com
